EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Over the past few months, our RH Contract and RH Trade teams have been reviewing their current business accounts.
In reviewing your account, it appears that the nature of your business does not fall within the RH Trade or RH Contract account requirements:
Our RH Contract division is focused on large architecture and design firms, developers, distributors, professional contractors and ownership groups working predominantly in the Hospitality, Commercial and Residential Building segments.
Our RH Trade division is focused on Residential interior designers, stagers and professional contractors working directly with homeowners on their individual residential design and home improvement projects.
We are consequently closing your RH Contract / RH Trade Account# {!Account.X12_Digit_Member__c} effective immediately.
We invite you to join our RH Membership Program and enjoy the following benefits:
· 25% savings on RH, RH Modern, RH Baby & Child, RH TEEN and RH Contemporary Art.
· 10% savings on all Sale
· Complimentary interior design services
· Concierge service to manage your orders
· Preferred financing plans on the RH Credit Card available, subject to approval
· Early access to clearance events
To learn more about this program and to sign up online, please click here.
Kind regards,
RH
